response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth to others and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an exclusive offer tailored to appreciate your interest early on. Don't miss out on this chance to own a valuable item at a fantastic deal!", "product_price": 120}
